remarks: Lemma for ~ aev and ~ axc16g .  Change free and bound variables. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Feb-2018.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 , along an idea of BJ. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-Nov-2019.)
statement:
aevlem1 $p |- ( A. z z = w -> A. y y = x ) $.
